original_text: So she set out from the place where she was with her two daughters-in-law, and they went on the way to return to the land of Judah.
korean_text: 있던 곳에서 나오고 두 며느리도 그와 함께 하여 유다 땅으로 돌아오려고 길을 가다가

sentences.original_text: So she set out from the place where she was with her two daughters-in-law,
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그녀는 두 며느리와 함께 있던 그곳을 떠났는데,

sentences.original_text: and they went on the way to return to the land of Judah.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 유다 땅으로 돌아가는 길을 갔다.
